title: A Golden Cage (NEWPORT GILDED AGE)
description:
Author: Shelley Freydont
Series: NEWPORT GILDED AGE
Paperback: 368 pages
Publisher: Berkley (June 7, 2016)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 042527585X
ISBN-13: 978-0425275856




With her mother in Europe, Deanna is staying with the Ballard family, who agree to chaperone her through the summer season and guide her toward an advantageous marriage proposalâ€”or so her mother hopes. Relishing her new freedom, Deanna is more interested in buying one of the fashionable new bathing costumes, joining a ladiesâ€™ bicycling club, and befriending an actress named Amabelle Deeks, all of which would scandalize her mother.

Far more scandalous is the discovery of a young man bludgeoned to death on the conservatory floor at Bonheur, the Ballardsâ€™ sumptuous â€œcottage.â€ Deanna recognizes him as an actor who performed at the birthday fete for a prominent judge the night before. But why was he at Bonheur? And where is Amabelle?

Concerned her new friend may be in dangerâ€”or worseâ€”Deanna enlists the help of her intrepid maid, Elspeth, and her former beau, Joe Ballard, to find Amabelle before the villain of this drama demands an encore
